T02D3487:134b-1: badzra t'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3487:134b-3: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3487:134b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3487:134b-5: sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis//
T02D3487:134b-6: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
T02D3487:134b-7: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs 'di //
T02D3487:134b-8: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D3487:134b-9: de la sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams su 'gyur te /
T02D3487:134b-10: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya bo dhi satv'a ya ma h'a satv'a ya /
T02D3487:134b-11: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02D3487:134b-13: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'am ma
T02D3487:134b-14: ma kri te dzambha ya stam bha ya mo ha
T02D3487:134b-15: ya bandha ya / h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sarba dusht'am stam bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02D3487:134b-16: de la dang po re zhig rang gi snying gar
T02D3487:134b-17: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la t'am yig gi sa bon
T02D3487:134b-19: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang /
T02D3487:134b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drangs te /
T02D3487:134b-22: sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par
T02D3487:134b-23: mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas
T02D3487:134b-24: te / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshig bcad brjod par bya'o //
T02D3487:134b-25: de nas tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par byas nas /
T02D3487:134b-26: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3487:134b-28: de nas pam yig las skyes pa'i //
T02D3487:134b-30: slar yang sa bon t'am yig bsgom //
T02D3487:134b-31: de nyid yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D3487:134b-32: ma mo'i dbus su bzhugs pa yi //
T02D3487:134b-33: yum gyur lha mo sgrol ma bsgom //
T02D3487:134b-34: zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste /
T02D3487:134b-35: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan gyur pa //
T02D3487:134b-37: / gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid can //
T02D3487:134b-38: sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i //
T02D3487:134b-39: zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
T02D3487:134b-40: ser dang gnag dang dkar dang dmar //
T02D3487:134b-41: g-yas skor gyi ni zhal bzhi'o //
T02D3487:134b-42: zhal ni so sor spyan gsum ste //
T02D3487:134b-43: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
T02D3487:134b-44: dbu rgyan 'od dmar sangs rgyas bzhi //
T02D3487:134b-45: rdo rje mda' dung mchog sbyin rnams //
T02D3487:134b-46: g-yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D3487:134b-47: autpal gzhu dang rdo rje yi //
T02D3487:134b-48: lcags kyu rdo rje zhags pa dang //
T02D3487:134b-49: sdigs mdzub g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams //
T02D3487:134b-50: rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3487:134b-51: sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D3487:134b-52: de mdun me tog sgrol ma ni //
T02D3487:135a-2: aom yig rnam pa las skyes pa'i //
T02D3487:135a-3: me tog phreng ba phyag na bsnams //
T02D3487:135a-4: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste //
T02D3487:135a-5: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3487:135a-6: lho ru bdug spos sgrol ma ni //
T02D3487:135a-7: sku mdog nag mo gzugs mdzes ma //
T02D3487:135a-8: rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa yi //
T02D3487:135a-9: phyag na spos kyi snod bsnams pa'o //
T02D3487:135a-10: nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma ni //
T02D3487:135a-11: sku mdog ser mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D3487:135a-12: gser gyi rna rgyan g-yo bas mdzes //
T02D3487:135a-13: phyag na mar me'i sdong bu bsnams //
T02D3487:135a-14: byang du dri yi sgrol ma ni //
T02D3487:135a-15: phyag na dri yi dung chos bsnams //
T02D3487:135a-16: lha mo sku mdog dmar zhing 'bar //
T02D3487:135a-17: snying po'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom bya //
T02D3487:135a-18: 'di rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02D3487:135a-19: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3487:135a-20: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs ma //
T02D3487:135a-21: lha mo lnga po 'di rnams ni //
T02D3487:135a-22: cung zad zhal ni gtsigs pa ste //
T02D3487:135a-23: rol pa'i stabs kyis yang dag bzhugs //
T02D3487:135a-24: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad bsams la /
T02D3487:135a-25: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo gdan drangs la /
T02D3487:135a-26: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pas 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3487:135a-27: de nas shar sgor bsgom bya ste //
T02D3487:135a-28: rdo rje lcags kyu 'od dkar mo //
T02D3487:135a-29: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag mtshan ma //
T02D3487:135a-30: shin tu yid 'ong bdag nyid do //
T02D3487:135a-31: lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma //
T02D3487:135a-32: shin tu 'dod dga' sku mdog gnag / gzugs mdzes rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
T02D3487:135a-33: rdo rje zhags pa 'chang ba'i mchog / nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ma //
T02D3487:135a-34: byag na rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams //
T02D3487:135a-35: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
T02D3487:135a-36: sku mdog ser mo bsam par bya //
T02D3487:135a-37: byang sgor rdo rje dril bu ma //
T02D3487:135a-38: phyag na rdo rje dril bu mchog / shin tu gzugs mdzes kha dog dmar //
T02D3487:135a-39: bzang mo'i gzugs ni blta bar bya //
T02D3487:135a-40: steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma //
T02D3487:135a-41: gzugs mdzes sku mdog ser mo ste //
T02D3487:135a-42: byang chub 'bras bu sbyin mdzad ma //
T02D3487:135a-46: sbrul gyi zhags pa phyag na bsnams //
T02D3487:135a-47: sku mdog nag mo bsgom par bya //
T02D3487:135a-48: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D3487:135a-49: shes bya kun mkhyen yin 'ong ma //
T02D3487:135a-50: yi ge bu po 'di rnams kyis //
T02D3487:135a-51: lha mo bcu ni rnams par sprul //
T02D3487:135a-52: pa rol phyin bcu dag pa ste /
T02D3487:135b-0: las kun rab tu @135b 'grub par byed //
T02D3487:135b-1: de la yi ge bcu rnams ni //
T02D3487:135b-2: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3487:135b-3: de bzhin du skur dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang //
T02D3487:135b-7: bzlas pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D3487:135b-8: bsgom par yang bya'o zhes so //
T02D3487:135b-9: sngags mchog 'di ni gtso bo ste //
T02D3487:135b-10: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D3487:135b-11: bklags pa yis ni dngos grub byed //
T02D3487:135b-12: gsal por rdo rje gur las gsungs //
T02D3487:135b-14: de la 'dir nye bar spyod pa ni sngags 'dis
T02D3487:135b-15: gos kyi sna la bzung nas lan bdun du bsngags
T02D3487:135b-16: shing mdud pa byas na 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D3487:135b-17: sa gang du 'gro yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro
T02D3487:135b-27: rta la sogs pas gnod bar mi byed do //
T02D3487:135b-28: de bzhin du sngags 'dis autpa la la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D3487:135b-29: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki me ba sha ma n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3487:135b-30: zhes pas gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3487:135b-31: de bzhin du sngags 'dis bya rog gi sgrol la
T02D3487:135b-32: lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas te dgra bo'i khang
T02D3487:135b-33: par sbas na nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur
T02D3487:135b-34: ro // aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re tsal
T02D3487:135b-35: pra tsa la sh'i ghram mi ni de ba datta
T02D3487:135b-36: autsatsha ta ya h'um phat ces pa ni bskrad pa'i
T02D3487:135b-37: ro // cho ga'o ; / de nas gzhan la sbyor ba ni /
T02D3487:135b-38: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu k'a
T02D3487:135b-39: bhi dh'a n'am ku m'a r'i ma hya mud b'a
T02D3487:135b-40: he na ta sy'a:bi t'a bra yatstshantu sv'a h'a /
T02D3487:135b-41: myos byed ga tum po'i sa bon dang //
T02D3487:135b-42: myos byed 'bras bu de bzhin du //
T02D3487:135b-43: mya ngan med shing me tog bcas //
T02D3487:135b-44: sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga byas te //
T02D3487:135b-45: mar sbrang bu ram sbyin sreg ni //
T02D3487:135b-46: bu mo sgrub la mchog tu bsngags //
T02D3487:135b-47: de nas zhig bdun sbyor ba yis //
T02D3487:135b-49: de nas gzhan la rab tu sbyor ba ni //
T02D3487:135b-50: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu k'a
T02D3487:135b-51: bhi dh'a n'am svastha'a na ta a'a karsha ya ma
T02D3487:135b-52: m'anti ke dza:zhes pa'i sngags 'dis rgya shug gi tsher
T02D3487:135b-53: ma la stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog
T02D3487:135b-54: la bsnyugs nas sbyin sreg byas nas 'dis rgyal po'i
T02D3487:135b-55: bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do //
T02D3487:135b-56: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3487:135b-58: byung gi me tog gis bskul ba'i ras la bcom
T02D3487:135b-59: ldan 'das ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma lcags kyu
T02D3487:135b-60: dang autpa la'i zhags pa phyag gnyis na bsnams pa
T02D3487:136a-2: zhes pa la sogs pas de'i mdun du mchod pa byas te /
T02D3487:136a-3: bsgom pa dang ldan pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3487:136a-4: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu k'i
T02D3487:136a-5: ma me pa tsi tam sva pnam ka th'a ya
T02D3487:136a-6: h'um phat / stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur te /
T02D3487:136a-7: zhags pas mgul pa bcings shing lcags kyus phug la autpal gyis rkang pa bcings te /
T02D3487:136a-8: bsgrub bya bkug nas rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams nas bran mo'i gzugs kyis longs spyod par bya'o //
T02D3487:136a-9: de nas gzhan la rab tu sbyor ba ni /
T02D3487:136a-10: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun du mngon par bsngags nas
T02D3487:136a-11: bdag nyid kyi mig gnyis la byugs nas rgyal po'i
T02D3487:136a-12: rigs kyi nang du zhugs na rgyal po dang bcas
T02D3487:136a-13: pas bla ma la sogs par byed cing gcig tu
T02D3487:136a-15: de nas gzhan la rab tu sbyor ba ni sgrol
T02D3487:136a-16: ma'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la sprul gdong
T02D3487:136a-17: gnyis pa'i mgo thal bar byas te ba dmar mo'i
T02D3487:136a-18: mar la aarka'i bal la sdong bu byas te rab
T02D3487:136a-19: tu sbar te mig sman bsag par bya'o //
T02D3487:136a-22: rdo rje chos dag yang dag par mnyes la rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o //
T02D3487:136a-23: de'i thal ba dang lhan cig tu mig sman mig
T02D3487:136a-24: la bskus na gang la rdo rje'i mig gis bltas
T02D3487:136a-25: pa de'i padma gar gyi dbang phyug 'dzag par 'gyur
T02D3487:136a-26: ro // de ltar ma gyur na sgrol ma bdag
T02D3487:136a-27: gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nges par bslus pa
T02D3487:136a-28: ro // yin no // de nas gzhan la sbyor
T02D3487:136a-29: ba ni lto ba'i srin bu la sgrol ma'i gzungs
T02D3487:136a-30: kyis lan bdun du mngon par bsngags nas rdo rje
T02D3487:136a-31: chos dang lhan cig tu byas te /
T02D3487:136a-32: de so rtsi dang sbyar la sbyin no //
T02D3487:136a-33: bya ba byed cing sbyor ba'i mchog 'dis mi gtong ste /
T02D3487:136a-34: rang gi chung ma bzhin du spyod par 'gyur ro //
T02D3487:136a-35: de las gzhan la rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3487:136a-36: so ma skyes pa'i bu chung gi lce blangs te
T02D3487:136a-37: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun du mngon par bsngags te
T02D3487:136a-39: gi wang dang lhan cig tu byas te dpral bar
T02D3487:136a-40: thig le byas na gang la bltas pa de dbang
T02D3487:136a-41: du 'gyur ro // de nas gzhan la yang rab
T02D3487:136a-42: tu sbyor ba ni zhag chen po rang gi lus
T02D3487:136a-43: la byugs te bsgoms pa dang lhan cig pas sgrol
T02D3487:136a-44: ma'i gzungs khri tsho gcig bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3487:136a-45: bzlas pa'i mthar 'bras s'a lu'i zan gyis dril phyis
T02D3487:136a-46: byas la dril phyis de bsdus te gang la byin
T02D3487:136a-47: pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur
T02D3487:136b-0: ro // de nas gzhan la rab tu sbyor @136b
T02D3487:136b-1: ba ni zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su sgrol
T02D3487:136b-2: ma'i gzungs bzlas shing bsnyen pa byas la /
T02D3487:136b-3: de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gis dung gi phye ma sbang bar bya'o //
T02D3487:136b-4: de gang la byin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D3487:136b-5: gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni sgrol ma'i gzungs
T02D3487:136b-6: myos byed kyi 'bras bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D3487:136b-8: 'bras bu rdo rje rta mgrin dang lhan cig tu byas te byugs na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3487:136b-9: gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3487:136b-10: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu k'a sya bandh'a na muktim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D3487:136b-11: sngags 'dis aarka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming bar
T02D3487:136b-12: du bcug ste bris nas sdig pa'i tshang du sbas
T02D3487:136b-13: na / bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
